conclusion.summary: Batch 2 optimization successfully completed for 4 pages (team.html, agri-food.html, branches.html, fruit-perish.html) with comprehensive improvements across all optimization categories. All pages now meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards, include complete SEO optimization, and feature enhanced functionality with proper error handling and user feedback.
